data.name: Yoga
data.description:
🧘‍♂️🪷 Elevate Your Practice with VR Yoga: The Ultimate 3D Experience

Embark on an immersive 3D guided yoga journey in virtual reality, transporting you to awe-inspiring locations 🌌🌲🏔️🏖️ Feel the crispness of snowy mountains, float in the vastness of outer space, or stand atop clear waters with mesmerizing marine life swimming beneath you. Find your center amidst the soothing sounds of a forest.

🛋️ Passthrough Feature: Our cutting-edge passthrough allows you to remain connected with your environment. See the mat beneath and surroundings, guaranteeing a safe, immersive practice.

🧘‍♂️ Guided 3D Transitions: No more uncertainty. Our instructor's silhouette serves as a precise 3D guide, ensuring clarity in every pose. You don't just observe; you embody the pose.

🔄 Rotating Instructor: Wherever you look, our instructor follows. Eliminating the need for neck straining or constant adjustments. Your comfort, our priority.

✋ Hand-Tracking: Experience precision like never before. Our real-time hand tracking breaks down each pose, guaranteeing flawless form and alignment.

📈 Multiple Levels: Catering to all—from novices to seasoned practitioners. Choose from diverse levels, each meticulously crafted to challenge and enrich your practice.

Begin this transformative journey with us, where traditional yoga meets groundbreaking technology. Elevate your practice with Yoga in VR 🧘‍♀️🌍🌊🌳
